body_content.explanation: extremely well-educated and interested in studying and other activities that involve careful thinking and mental effort:
examples: He regarded the professor as an impractical, superintellectual type.
The course is a magnet for super-intellectual people.

body_content.explanation: relating to the ability to think and understand things, especially very complicated ideas:
examples: I wanted to get away from the kind of superintellectual music I was writing.
Computers should be able to help us solve super-intellectual problems.
